document_data.name: ''Oil of Cloaking''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Oil of cloaking''''' was a magical substance that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|46}}{{Cite dragon/179/Wonders of the Land of Fate}}
document_data.Description: The vast majority of magical potions and oils in Zakhara were found in durable flasks sealed with crystal and wax. These flasks were wider and the bottom than they were at the top.
document_data.Powers:
When smeared on an inanimate object, oil of cloaking masked any magical properties of the item for up to one day. Casting ''[[detect magic]]'' or similar spells did not reveal anything about the magical nature of the cloaked item. Casting ''[[legend lore]]'' on a cloaked item still revealed its history.

A flask of this oil could only be used once regardless of how much oil was used. A single flask could be used to cloak an item the size of a normal man or smaller.
